committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which, for fiscal years 1983, 1984, and 1985, reduce and delay cost-of-living increases in annuities and retired or retainer pay based on Government service and reduce, in relation to the amount of such increases, the pay of members and former members of the uniformed services for their service in Federal civilian positions.

summary.text: Repeals specified provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which for FY 1983 through 1985: (1) reduce and delay cost of living increases in annuities and retired or retainer pay based on Government service; and (2) reduce, in relation to the amount of such increases, the pay of members and former members of the uniformed services holding Federal civilian positions.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1982 which, for fiscal years 1983, 1984, and 1985, reduce and delay cost-of-living increases in annuities and retired or retainer pay based on Government service and reduce, in relation to the amount of such increases, the pay of members and former members of the uniformed services for their service in Federal civilian positions.
